testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I choose creating new adaptive assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the assignment "Change Entry Mode Adaptive Assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I select the Anonymous Practice radio button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I create question "Maple-Graded" with label "Maple-Graded Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I choose "Maple-graded" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then I see the "Maple" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Change Entry Mode Adaptive Assignment" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And it is named as "Change Entry Mode Adaptive Assignment" in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I launch the "Change Entry Mode" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: And I click the Change Entry Mode link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then I see the Math Editor Div
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: When I click the Change Entry Mode link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode

testcase.name: Then I see the Math input textbox
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Adaptive Practice Assignment with a question and change its entry mode
